## ğŸ¯ InformaÃ§Ãµes para Preencher no Dashboard do Vercel

Use estas informaÃ§Ãµes exatas ao criar o projeto no Vercel:

### 1. **Project Name** (Nome do Projeto)
```
aiexx-genai-text-to-3d-web
```

### 2. **Framework Preset**
```
Other
```
ou deixe em **branco** (Vercel detectarÃ¡ automaticamente)

### 3. **Root Directory** âš ï¸ IMPORTANTE
```
web
```
**Clique em "Edit" e configure como `web`**

### 4. **Build Command**
```
npm install && npm run build
```

### 5. **Output Directory**
```
dist
```

### 6. **Install Command**
```
npm install
```

### 7. **Development Command**
```
npm run dev
```

## âœ… Checklist de ConfiguraÃ§Ã£o

- [ ] **Project Name**: `aiexx-genai-text-to-3d-web`
- [ ] **Framework Preset**: `Other` (ou deixar em branco)
- [ ] **Root Directory**: `web` âš ï¸ **CRÃTICO**
- [ ] **Build Command**: `npm install && npm run build`
- [ ] **Output Directory**: `dist`
- [ ] **Install Command**: `npm install`
- [ ] **Development Command**: `npm run dev`
